content: your infinity scarf can be made to any length using stitches in multiples of 2 you can do your starting chain row with a larger hook one size up to ensure that your chains are loose chain 1 in the beginning of a round does not count as a stitch it is suggested that you use a stitch marker to identify the 1st st of each round to begin chain 240 join with a slip_stitch into the 1st chain making sure that you do not twist your chain round 1 chain 1 place a stitch marker here and keep it in single_crochet into each chain join with a slip_stitch into your 1st single_crochet stitch count 240 single_crochet rounds 2 & 3 chain 1 single_crochet 240 join with a slip_stitch into your 1st single_crochet stitch count 240 single_crochet round 4 chain 1 work a double_crochet into each single_crochet of round 2 working over and enclosing round 3 join with a slip_stitch into your 1st double_crochet stitch count 240 double_crochet round 5 start with a beginning 4dc-cluster chain 1 skip next st 4dc-cluster into the next st chain 1 skip next st 119 times join with a slip_stitch into the top of your beginning 4dc-cluster stitch count 120 4dc-cluster 120 chain 1 spaces round 6 chain 1 single_crochet into each 4dc-cluster and chain 1 space join with a slip_stitch into your 1st single_crochet stitch count 240 single_crochet 2 round 7 chain 1 single_crochet 240 join with a slip_stitch into your 1st single_crochet stitch count 240 single_crochet round 8 chain 1 work a double_crochet into each single_crochet of round 6 working over and enclosing round 7 join with a slip_stitch into your 1st double_crochet stitch count 240 double_crochet note we are doing the bean stitch in the round after completing round 9 your first bean stitch of round 10 will be in the first bean stitch of round 9 after completing round 10 your first bean stitch of round 11 will be in the first bean stitch of round 10 to complete round 11 you will slip_stitch back into the first bean stitch of round 11 rounds 9 10 & 11 to begin round 9 bean st into the same st as your slip_stitch skip next st bean st into the next st skip next st 119 times then complete rounds 10 and 11 as follows bean st into the next st 120 times continue in the round as in the notes above end with a slip_stitch into the top of the 1st bean st stitch count 120 bean sts round 12 chain 1 work a single_crochet into each bean st and space between the bean sts join with a slip_stitch into your 1st single_crochet stitch count 240 single_crochet round 13 chain 1 single_crochet 240 join with a slip_stitch into your 1st single_crochet stitch count 240 single_crochet round 14 chain 1 work a double_crochet into each single_crochet of round 12 working over and enclosing round 13 join with a slip_stitch into
